On June 11th, 2009 Yahoo! Groups will be undergoing maintenance. During
th=
is time 50% of groups will be unavailable for up to an hour. The
outage is =
scheduled to begin some time between 2 and 3 pm PT (10-11 pm
GMT).

While t=
he maintenance is going on, all features of affected group,
including messa=
ges, photos, attachments, etc. will be completely
unavailable. However, onc=
e the outage concludes, any messages that were
posted to these groups via e=
mail during this downtime will be
distributed.
